TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientFormatterSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink
Public Interface IClientFormatterSink Implements IClientChannelSink, IMessageSink
type IClientFormatterSink = interface interface IMessageSink interface IClientChannelSink interface IChannelSinkBase

Docs.summary: Marca um coletor como um coletor do formatador do cliente que serializa mensagens em um fluxo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Coletores de formatador devem implementar <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink> e <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink>. <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink> combina em uma interface.
